methods.javadoc:
Returns the description of this transaction.
@return the description of this transaction
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns the description of this transaction.

methods.name: getOpenSubTransactions
methods.comment:
Returns the list of open sub-transactions that are contained
 inside this transaction.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this fully committed transaction has a corresponding 
 database transaction/checkpoint.
methods.name: hasCommittedDBTransaction
methods.comment:
Returns true if this fully committed transaction has a corresponding 
 database transaction/checkpoint.
